Text: Keeps crashing and pauls voice wont install

Does anyone know how to save the text with Kate's voice, or does anyone have a manual? 

When I try to save to mp3 or wav it defaults to Microsoft Sam's voice in the audio file.

ok found out Paul's voice was crap so i re-doloaded it thank for letting me know about the  crashing it  the serial number that is bad it talks to the main server to validate it i need some one to crack this program or build a keygen

I was crashing for me too as well as pauls voice but if you leave kates voice installed and then install the free Natural Reader 11 kates voice will still work.  ^_^  Just was wanting to add this for others.  Good luck.
